title: System Dynamics-Based Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and PC/Mobile Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Simulation modeling competency enhancement for working professionals to apply to job-related problem-solving. Utilizes online collaboration tools in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure (Stock-Flow) of system dynamics models
Learners can build simple business simulation models using tools like Vensim/PowerSim
Learners can derive actionable insights applicable to real workplaces by analyzing simulation results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
